!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-05-12 15:59:29.200
!MESSAGE No saved state can be found for editor id= name=<null>

!

?yvind - If it's possible, it would be really helpful to know what steps you
took to get this. Thanks!

I didn't do anything out of the ordinary, however here are some random pieces of
information that isolated aren't particularly interesting:

- I hadn't restarted Eclipse in, say, 1 week
- There appeared to be some sort of performance problem with everything going
very slowly before I restarted Eclipse
- Didn't happen when I tried it today
- I'm searching a large number of files(>20000), so I frequently use the search
results before the search is complete
- Eclipse M6 Linux GTK

Created an attachment (id=21201)
more exceptions while clicking quickly on next-in-search-view while  search is
still running

This seems to have disappeared in the latest builds. I tried both click on next
results in a completed search pane and clicking next on a search in progress. I
got no exceptions in the log for either. Tried on both Windows + Linux. Please
reopen if you feel this is still a problem.

- BG
